key_0.name: Grateful Dead
key_0.set1: Iko Iko, Little Red Rooster-> Peggy-O, Beat It On Down The Line-> Stagger Lee, It's All Over Now, Bertha-> One More Saturday Night
key_0.set2: Mississippi Half Step-> Franklin's Tower-> Playin' In The Band-> China Doll-> Drums-> Gimme Some Lovin'-> Black Peter-> Sugar Magnolia, E: Day Job

key_1.name: Grateful Dead
key_1.set1: Jack Straw, They Love Each Other, CC Rider, Loser, Women Are Smarter-> Deal
key_1.set2: The Mighty Quinn-> Samson & Delilah, He's Gone-> Smokestack Lightning-> Comes A Time-> Drums-> The Other One-> Around & Around-> Good Lovin', E: It's All Over Now Baby Blue
key_1.comment: Chinese New Year, Chinese Symphony Orchestra opened

key_2.name: Grateful Dead
key_2.set1: China Cat Sunflower-> I Know You Rider, Minglewood Blues, Dupree's Diamond Blues, Me & My Uncle-> Mexicali Blues, Bird Song-> The Music Never Stopped-> Might As Well
key_2.set2: Drums*-> Iko Iko*-> Eyes Of The World*-> Drums*-> Truckin'-> Stella Blue-> Not Fade Away-> E: Not Fade Away*-> Hey Bo Diddley*-> Goin' Down The Road Feelin' Bad*
key_2.comment: *with Members of the Nevelle Brothers. Encore without Phil, Weir on tamborine.

key_3.name: Grateful Dead
key_3.set1: Hell In A Bucket-> Sugaree, Tons Of Steel, Tennessee Jed, Cassidy-> Don't Ease Me In
key_3.set2: Scarlet Begonias-> Fire On The Mountain-> Estimated Prophet-> Drums*-> Hand Jive**, The Wheel-> Midnight Hour*-> Johnny B. Goode*, E: U.S. Blues
key_3.comment: *with Members of the Nevelle Brothers **without Phil. Neville Brothers Opened

key_4.name: Grateful Dead
key_4.set1: Feel Like A Stranger-> Cold Rain & Snow, Mama Tried-> Big River, West L.A. Fadeaway, Looks Like Rain-> Brown Eyed Women, Let It Grow
key_4.set2: Keep On Growing-> Lost Sailor-> Saint Of Circumstance-> Terrapin Station-> Drums-> Wharf Rat-> Throwing Stones-> Turn On Your Love Light, E: Brokedown Palace

key_5.name: Grateful Dead
key_5.set1: Hell In A Bucket-> Stagger Lee, CC Rider, Cold Rain & Snow-> Beat It On Down The Line-> Big Railroad Blues-> Looks Like Rain-> Visions Of Johanna-> The Music Never Stopped-> Don't Ease Me In
key_5.set2: China Cat Sunflower-> I Know You Rider-> Playin' In The Band-> Drums-> The Wheel-> Truckin'-> Black Peter-> Around & Around

key_7.set2: Uncle John's Band-> Terrapin Station-> Playin' In The Band-> Drums-> I Need A Miracle-> Stella Blue-> Sugar Magnolia, E: It's All Over Now Baby Blue

key_8.set1: Gimme Some Lovin'-> Deal, Hand Jive, Candyman, Cassidy, West L.A. Fadeaway, Mama Tried-> Big River-> Might As Well
key_8.set2: Shakedown Street-> Samson & Delilah, He's Gone-> Spoonful-> Drums-> The Other One-> Comes A Time-> Good Lovin', E: Day Job

key_9.set2: Mississippi Half Step-> Women Are Smarter, High Time, Lost Sailor-> Saint Of Circumstance-> Drums-> Morning Dew, E: Midnight Hour

key_10.set1: Feel Like A Stranger, Tennessee Jed, CC Rider, Tons Of Steel, It Must Have Been The Roses, Desolation Row-> Don't Ease Me In
key_10.set2: Scarlet Begonias-> Touch Of Grey-> Looks Like Rain-> Goin' Down The Road Feelin' Bad-> Drums-> Just Like Tom Thumb's Blues-> Black Peter-> Throwing Stones-> Turn On Your Love Light, E: Brokedown Palace

key_11.name: Grateful Dead
key_11.set1: Jack Straw-> Peggy-O, Minglewood Blues, Revolutionary Hamstrung Blues-> Bertha-> Wang Dang Doodle-> Big Railroad Blues, Supplication-> Promised Land
key_11.set2: China Cat Sunflower-> I Know You Rider-> Estimated Prophet-> Eyes Of The World-> Drums-> Spanish Jam-> Truckin'-> Wharf Rat-> Sugar Magnolia, E: Day Job
key_11.comment: Only time "Revolutionary Hamstrung Blues" was ever performed.

key_12.name: Grateful Dead

FM Broadcast on KFOG
David Crosby then The Neville Brothers opened
